subject: Re: Kodilo - Heath
preview: Heath increased to 10 hours after speaking with Dim.

full_threads.body: Heath increased to 10 hours after speaking with Dim.

Hi Kosta,

As mentioned the pricing updates are finally done!!

Here is a video that shows you how to update the images and to reorder the products in the category view: https://www.loom.com/share/65860072f20c443981e4493285a05e69

Let me know if you need anything else.

FYI, I've spent a load of hours on this one, and will only be billing for 4 hrs to cover some of our teams costs.

Hi Kosta,

Yes no probs, I will be actioning this one today and get you an update.

Hi Heath,

Are you able to let me know when this might get completed?

Supplier is putting pressure on us to get these products live, please advise.

Cheers,
Kosta

Hi Heath,

This has all been completed.

As mentioned, I moved all the 'simple' products into their own tab and removed them from the 'new products' tab.

Please advise if this is all good to get live onto the site? we need to move on this asap.

cheers,
Kosta

Hey Heath,

Perfect, understood will have this sorted hopefully tonight.

Cheers,
Kosta

Hi Kosta,

I have it working!! There are 2 columns I need you to update in the sheet you shared with me. Please see this video: https://www.loom.com/share/307184625c0441749b6f2fc8ad8d4fe7?sid=4e4fa8bf-54bd-4025-8434-60a1fff7420f

Let me know if you have any questions?

Cheers

Hi Kosta,

Please see attached the spreadsheet with new products only: "231208 alder_product_export KODILO - NEW Products.csv"

My previous email has the import format, let me know if you have any questions or if you want to run through these sheets together?

HI Heath,

Thanks for this.

As mentioned, can you please send across the csv file with only the new products so that I can start working on this?

Cheers,
Kosta
Import file to update existing products.

Hi Kosta,

I have an update and solution for you as promised.

We have 2 'buckets' of products: Existing Products and New Products.

  • Existing products are relatively easy now. I have prepped a spreadsheet that will also us to import the new prices in 1 click 🙂 There are 606 of these products and I have successfully tested the upload process in staging. I matched them up with their SKUs
  • New products is where it gets interesting, these will need to manually updated on a spreadsheet prior to us importing them in 1 click OR you can of course punch away and add them in manually. There are 617 of these in total.

For the New Products, I have attached an export of the current live products, so that you can see the format in which these will need to be added to spreadsheet. I can talk you through the columns, some can be skipped. I'm hoping there's a bit of a pattern that will emerge and aid in this step. If you choose to do them manually, then disregard this part.

I have a heavy morning of meetings, but can speak up to 10am and then anytime after our CamperACT meeting.

Thanks Chris, appreciate it

Kosta Galanis
Performance Marketing Lead

T: (02) 9171 4990 | M: 0452 504 090

Hi Kosta, 

I just had a quick chat with Heath about the upload. He mentioned you have discussed it previously and he'll be able to action it upon his return as of Monday 22nd of Jan.

Hey Chris,

Are we just able to merely upload the new products without doing any optimisation for now?

Cheers,
Kosta

Hi Kosta,

Most welcome.

We just did a test with product ID group 5694 for 3 images. It took 12 mins for 3 images. That allows for the download, optimisation, upload and ALT text.

Based on the above, we expect to spend approximately 28 hours on the images.

Please note, the bulk upload may see that number change as it will only import new items.

Hi Chris,

Thanks for the update.

What's it going to to take in terms of rough hours to get the 433 products uploaded and optimised?

Cheers,
Kosta

Hi Kosta, 

Jumping in for Heath as he is away until Monday, 22nd Jan. 

You mentioned you need these ASAP, and I was hoping you could provide us with a day/date for go-live? 

From what I can see there are already 521 Alder products uploaded to the website and 954 unique SKUs on the spreadsheet. I estimate that 433 new items need image download and optimisation.

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Chris Paradowski
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Please find the attached SEIMA brand product upload for Kodilo.

Please note the following:

1) This sheet contains already existing products on our site, for these existing products please don't replace them. Instead just upload the new products
2) When uploading can you please place all the new products as 'uncategorised' so that we can easily filter and assign them to the relevant categories/sub categories?

Please advise if there is anything you need to facilitate this, otherwise, can we please get this sorted asap as we need all the new products showing for advertising purposes.

Cheers,
Kosta

--
Kosta Galanis
Performance Marketing Lead
T: (02) 9171 4990 | M: 0452 504 090
